description: error; power issues; reinstalled firmware; now runnng
error; unknow reason was not notified for 9 days that there was an issue. updated firmwater with new version.
download; no detections. no marker tag; malfunctioned
offload; no detections; reader shutting down and starting on nearly daily basis due to low power. not marker tag; no detection but antenna shows that it is tuned.
tried tuning antenna; not working correctly; not sure why
installed new antenna; but would not tune so had to bring it back to the shop with reader and tuner
reinstalled new antenna; the reader was the issue; swapped with a different reader. now tuned well and added a new marker tag.
